title: Honest John: do I need an International Driving Permit if we leave the EU before I take a holiday in Greece?
text:
If your car has developed a fault, or for consumer advice, turn to Honest John by emailing honestadvice@telegraph.co.uk

Grecian learn

What personal paperwork do I need to take to Greece to cover the hire car that I have booked as part of my package holiday? Will I need an International Driving Permit if we are supposed to have left the EU before I depart? DR

Print a download of your driving licence details from gov.uk/view-driving-licence. The special “check code” to share your driving record with someone else is valid for 21 days only, so do it closer to your trip. Whether the UK leaves the EU by the end of this month or not, if there is no deal you also need to get an International Driving...
